#summary &boxvh; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxvh;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxVH;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/256c/index.htm U+0256C].
  * `&boxVh;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/256b/index.htm U+0256B].
  * `&boxvH;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/256a/index.htm U+0256A].
  * `&boxvh;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/253c/index.htm U+0253C].
